def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState if widget.ProviderWidget <> None and (widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.State == EntityState.Initialized): widget.Hidden = True return

from System import Array
entidade = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity
almoxarifados = Array[str](['PD_ALMOXARIFADOPRODUTOS', 'PD_ALMOXARIFADOS'])
if (entidade.GetEntityDefinition().Name in almoxarifados): widget.Hidden = entidade.SelecaoCargaHistoricoDeAlteracao()
